attributes.action: PROVIDE MEMBERS OF THE TA & RESERVE FORCES A PRO-RATA PENSION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CURRENTLY MEMBERS OF THE TA & RESERVE FORCES DO NOT RECIEVE A PENSION. THE GOVERNMENT CLASSES THEM AS "CASUAL LABOUR" THEREFORE DO NOT GET PART-TIME WORKERS RIGHTS.
RETAINED FIREMEN NOW GET A PENSION. MORE AND MORE RESERVISTS ARE BEING SENT INTO WAR ZONES.
RECOGNISE THEIR COMMITMENT & EFFORT GIVE THEM A FAIR PENSION NOW!
